author: Michael Le Page
title: We haven’t identified any new drugs for severe covid-19 cases yet
description: A number of potential drugs for treating the coronavirus are in trials. There are some promising candidates but it’s unclear if they’ll help those who need them most
content:
By Michael Le Page
It will be many months before we have an effective vaccine
ANDREW CABALLERO-REYNOLDS/AFP via Getty Images
Despite what you may have heard, although several potential drugs for covid-19 are being trialled around the world, few results hav… [+4761 chars]
